value.title: Why Your Strategy For AI Might Be To Not Do AI
value.excerpt: Choose a problem that actually needs AI. Avoid having a solution (AI) and trying to find a problem to solve. Identify problems or opportunities that your organization has and assess whether AI is the right tool for the job. This way you focus investment and prevent over-engineering costly solutions.

value.title: An AI Nightmare Has Arrived for Twitter — And the FBI
value.excerpt: So-called “revenge porn,” explicit material obtained by hacking or shared in confidence with someone who makes it available to others without the subject’s consent, is hardly a novel crime among adolescents. But this time, the images were startlingly different. Though they looked realistic, they had been created with a generative AI program.

value.title: Generative AI is everything, everywhere, all at once
value.excerpt: Many notable tech companies are building their own large language models, whether it's Microsoft's Bing, Google's Bard, Snapchat's AI chatbot, or the new Meta AI chatbots. Generative AI is projected to balloon to a $1.32 billion market by 2032, according to a report by Bloomberg Intelligence .
